entry.title: 月影忍者-變形的上弦月
entry.content:
``` perl automacro zangetsu {

class Oboro
aggressives < 1
status not 動作延遲
status not 變形的上弦月狀態
location not prontera
location not payon
location not payg_cas02
location not geffen
eval ($::char->{'hp'} == int($::char->{'hp'} / 2) * 2 && $::char->{'sp'} == int($::char->{'sp'} / 2) * 2)
call {
$csp = @eval(int(($.sp / 2)) * 2)
log $csp
log HP:$.hp SP:$.sp;do ss 3026
}
timeout 30

} ```
